channel.title: Help!How to add Nex armours to 562 server(Exilium)
channel.description:
:confused:I need help with how to add Torva,Pernix and Virtus armour to 562 server(Exilium soruce and client). :confused: If you can help me reply under this post or add me on skype: kisria123
Thanks. :o

item.title: Help!How to add Nex armours to 562 server(Exilium)

Ex has Torva and that init doesnt it?
also to change the ip just search in the client folder “localhost” or “127.0.0.1”
